text: Chao Feng (1928 â€“ 8 January 2023) was a Chinese editor and publisher. Chao was the president and editor-in-chief of Shanghai Dictionary Publishing House, and the president and editor-in-chief of Shanghai People's Publishing House. Feng died at Shanghai Huadong Hospital on 8 January 2023 at the age of 95. ==References== Category:Chinese editors Category:Chinese publishers Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Chao Feng
